name: "DiceWalk" - a GMTK 2022 submission
description:
GMTK2022: VOTE OR WE WILL PUT BUTTER IN YOUR SOCKS!

Seriously: Collect all coins!

Our mighty hero needs to collect coins.  He can move horizontally or vertically but his movements are limited by a rolling dice!

The hero can only go the number of steps into a certain direction which is shown on the dice face looking into that direction.  While going, the dice will be rolled, too.

This is a submission to the GMTK Game Jam 2022.

Controls:

WASD / Arrow Keys
- roll dice in this direction
- number of rolls taken from dice face in this direction
- also moves character this number of fields

Q / Shift-Left
- rotate dice left

E / Shift-Right
 - rotate dice right
